title: Create Wallet
content: Use the m3s wallet module to create and connect a wallet.

title: Check Incoming Balance
content: Check if the wallet has received the expected amount. This simulates a funding transaction from the M3S system.

title: Execute the Swap Transaction
content: Initiate the cross-chain swap by executing the selected quote with the connected wallet. Monitor transaction status in real-time.

title: View Transaction Details
content: View the result of the refund, such as the transaction hash and destination.
